attributes.action: SAVE EDINBURGH PRISON OFFICERS SOCIAL CLUB
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This year we celebrate 5o years since the club opened as a safe environment for officers and their families to socialise in. The Scottish Prison Service are planning to close the club, THEY HAVE CLOSED ALL BUT 2 OF THE CLUBS IN SCOTLAND, enough is enough, they are destroying the community spirit and taking away officers rights, please add your name and forward the petition to others. Linda Aitken Social Convener
